main event: A bright light was observed in the sky moving rapidly and erratically in New York City on November 23-24, 1950.
interesting points: The object was reported as a single bright light,It moved rapidly and erratically for approximately 3 minutes,The observer believed it was under intelligent control,The conclusion drawn from the sighting was insufficient data,No physical evidence or photographs were recorded.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: A civilian observer with prior military background.
